title: Best of The Program | Guests: Gov. Greg Abbott & Todd Staples | 4/22/20
description:
Texas Oil & Gas Association President Todd Staples provides a look at the state of American energy and reopening the economy. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott describes how Texas is leading the movement to safely reopen states. Can the Paycheck Protection Program loans go to actual small businesses, please? And can we STOP bailing out massive universities?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
